html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13012022-12-07,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit any person in Canada or any Canadian outside Canada from providing the services listed in the new Schedule, to or for the benefit of Russia or any person in Russia, in relation to the maritime transport of Russian crude oil and petroleum products, unless the oil or petroleum products are purchased at or below the price cap; 2) impose an exception to the service prohibition for transactions involving goods that were loaded onto a vessel at the port of loading prior to December 5, 2022, and unloaded at the port of destination prior to January 19, 2023; (3) impose an exception to the service prohibition for transactions responding to an emergency situation, where implicated services are necessary to ensure navigational safety or to minimize danger to human life or damage to the environment; and (4) impose exceptions to the service prohibition related to the importation of crude oil and petroleum products into the Republic of Bulgaria, the Republic of Croatia, and landlocked European Union Member States.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0261 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
